problem_text_cn: 如图AB∥CD,直线EF分别交AB、CD于E、F两点,∠AEF的平分线交CD于点G,若∠EFG=64°,则∠EGF的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure AB ∥ CD, the straight line EF intersects AB and CD at two points E and F respectively, and the bisector of ∠AEF intersects CD at point G. If ∠EFG = N_0, then the degree of ∠EGF is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线的性质,角平分线的定义等知识,解题的关键是熟练掌握基本知识,属于中考常考题型.
